import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.scss'] }) export default class RegisterComponent { }

Register

*FirstName is required
*LastName is required
*Email is required
*UserName is required
*Password is required
*Confirm Password is required
Already Have Account? Login Here
